trends: There have been no other sightings in north of Edmonton, 80 mil
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsfirstly, this event is described from a friend who witness the event along with his son and 2 of his friends. he owns a farm in a valley with a river running through it, at the time my friend was sleeping..trying to sleep off a night of drinking. his son and his friends was cooling off in the stream in the valley. about 1\2 mile away from the farm. when his son awoke him and told him the sun was falling. his estimates the time the sun was falling until the actual landing of the craft was over 3 hours or even longer. so this craft took along time to land. once it landed his son told his dad...theirs a ufo outside of his house. the father wakes up...opens the door and sure anough a huge ship lands in the valley. it was so huge...it blocks out the sun and make the surrounding valley dark. the dad looks up and sees windows and ballonies all over this ship. he tells me...it was huge. tiny lights float down from the craft...another light comes out of the ship and goes into the ground. alot of more stuff happened too...like they are trapped in the house..while the ufo is right outside. the event takes forever. he even has time to call to his brothers house and tell him what's happening but nobody believes him. he is scared...along with his kids. the craft stay on the ground for over 8 hours...he tells me it took the craft afew hours to land and it seems like they drilled a hole into the ground too. the next day...the government quarantined the whole area with danger tape saying it's a h2s leak...along with news of a torando landing. i myself heard this new about the tornado...just north of edmonton. he always tried to get someone to listen to his story but nobody believes him. i do..will pass on his information and contact phone number if you guys contact me. he has a greater account of the whole exprience... jp
